articles.title: Coronavirus will test the Trump administration's ability to handle a crisis

articles.content:
Washington (CNN)President Donald Trump was sitting for breakfast with American business leaders last week when the conversation turned to the dangerous new virus spreading from China.

articles.title: Evacuees from Wuhan are on a plane to the United States. Should they be quarantined?
articles.description: An airliner from Wuhan, China, is expected to land in Ontario, California, on Wednesday, filled with US citizens who could possibly be infected with the deadly Wuhan coronavirus.
articles.content:
(CNN)An airliner from Wuhan, China, is expected to land in Ontario, California, on Wednesday, filled with US citizens who could possibly be infected with the deadly Wuhan coronavirus. 
There could be 240 passengers on board, flying in from the very epicenter… [+4499 chars]

articles.title: Starbucks has closed more than half of its Chinese stores because of coronavirus
articles.description: Starbucks has closed more than half of its roughly 4,300 Chinese stores, as the deadly coronavirus continues to spread in the country.
articles.content:
New York (CNN Business)Starbucks has closed more than half of its roughly 4,300 Chinese stores, as the deadly coronavirus continues to spread in the country.

articles.title: US companies are starting to ban employees from China travel
articles.description: Facebook, Ford and other high-profile companies have told their employees not to travel to China as the deadly coronavirus continues to spread.

articles.author: Jordan Valinsky, CNN Business
articles.title: United Airlines suspends some flights between US and China as coronavirus spreads
articles.description: United Airlines is temporarily reducing its schedule between the United States and three cities in China in light of the Wuhan virus.

articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: There's been a run of surgical masks in the US because of the coronavirus scare. You don't need them, physicians say
articles.description: Americans are buying up surgical masks from major retailers to protect themselves from the novel coronavirus despite the CDC's position that the virus poses a low threat to the US. Some masks are effective in preventing transmission, but experts say Americans…
articles.content:
(CNN)In Wuhan, China, where the novel coronavirus has killed at least 106 people and sickened 4,515 more, wearing face masks is mandatory. 
Half a world way in the US, major retailers are selling out of basic surgical masks amid panic from consumers.(So far,… [+4077 chars]

articles.title: Escape story: US citizen describes attempt to flee Wuhan
articles.description: Priscilla Dickey and her 8-year-old daughter were among the Americans to board a charter flight arranged by the US government to leave Wuhan, China, the city put on lockdown due to the coronavirus outbreak. CNN's David Culver reports.

articles.title: Japan travel agency faces 20,000 cancellations
articles.description: The phone lines at Kamome, a Tokyo-based travel agency that specializes in tours for Chinese tourists, haven't stopped buzzing. On Sunday, China announced a ban on outbound group travel as part of its battle to stop the spread of the Wuhan coronavirus.
